name: Opvia
slogan: Enable the next wave of life changing technology

team.title: CEO
team.name: William Moss
team.bioHtml: Founder of Opvia - we are hiring!

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description:
**Want to do something worthwhile?**

Our goal is to enable a 10X reduction in the cost of producing biologics, making these advanced medicines available for all. 

**Want to do something cool?**

We're combing the potential of cutting-edge optical techniques with machine learning to enable real-time non-invasive measurement of these complex fluid systems.

**What would your impact be?**

You'll be working directly with Jon (Our CTO) on the engine of our first product! - designing and creating robust and interpretable machine learning models which take in complex spectra and output useful parameters.
